name: intelligence-ingestion
description: Zero-loss strategic information pipeline. Analyzes URLs, articles, tweets for strategic value, auto-generates draft Skills when new capabilities are detected.
author: sarahmirrand001-oss

obsidian_vault_path.description: Absolute path to the user's Obsidian vault root directory. This skill writes structured notes here.

intelligence_folder.description: Subfolder within the Obsidian vault for intelligence notes.

landscape_path.description: Path to STRATEGIC_LANDSCAPE.md relative to workspace. This file is read and may be written to.

output_dir.description: Directory for non-knowledge outputs (posts, scripts). Optional.

xurl_auth.description: X/Twitter API v2 authentication via the xurl skill. Only needed for reading X/Twitter links.

read: {workspace}/skills/ — reads existing skills directory for gap analysis
{workspace}/STRATEGIC_LANDSCAPE.md — reads capability map for architectural mapping
{config.obsidian_vault_path}/ — reads existing notes to avoid duplicates
write: {workspace}/STRATEGIC_LANDSCAPE.md — updates capability map when critical info is ingested
{workspace}/skills/_drafts/ — creates auto-synthesized skill draft folders (isolated, not auto-loaded)
create: {workspace}/STRATEGIC_LANDSCAPE.md — auto-creates from template if missing on first run

network_behavior.description: This skill fetches content from user-provided URLs. If primary extraction fails, it falls back to alternative methods, expanding the network footprint.
fallback_chain: xurl skill — authenticated X API call (if configured)
web search — search engine query for cached content
network_behavior.note: The 'never return empty-handed' policy means the skill may make multiple external requests per ingestion.

privacy_considerations: URLs and their content are stored as Obsidian notes in the user's local vault.
No data is transmitted to external servers beyond the original URL fetch and optional search fallback.
All generated files remain local to the user's filesystem.
persistence_effects: Creates markdown files in the Obsidian vault (one per ingestion).
Appends to daily memory log files.
May create skill draft folders under skills/_drafts/ (never auto-activated).
Auto-creates STRATEGIC_LANDSCAPE.md from template if file does not exist on first run.

input.description: Any URL to analyze (web pages, X/Twitter, GitHub repos, arXiv papers)
Pasted article content, tweet text, or any external information
examples: MCP is the new TCP for agents...

output.description: Structured intelligence note with classification, strategic scoring, and capability boundary analysis
Auto-synthesized Skill definition when actionable new capability is detected. Requires human review.
output.condition: Content describes a usable tool/API/protocol not yet in Agent's capability set

output.description: Strategic Landscape capability map update for critical information

optional.name: xurl-skill
optional.reason: Authenticated X/Twitter API v2 access. Requires separate credential configuration.

safety.principle: Agent cannot install modules on itself. All synthesized Skills are drafts requiring human approval before activation.
